data.message:
"The Real Poet Christopher"
You all look like you never read a poet before,
My book on the floor, 
Like Selena and Justin just came through the door
Worse than before
They both were whores,
Touching asses and
Humping on the hotel furniture.
It's the return of the- 
"Ah, wait. No way. You're kidding.
He didn't just try to copy Eminem, did he?"
And Slim Shady said...
I'm a criminal subliminal
With a moral compass minimal
and a knack for timing syllables
To the beat of a Dre residual. 
I'm an urban poet legible
On subway cars indelible.
Completely unforgettable 
With rhymes this so incredible.
Addicting like a chemical.
Changing theoreticals.
Shocking life electricals.
Enlightened dialecticals.
So, Marshall, you're extendable.
Accomplishments commendable.
Almost evangelical. 
You've made me much less skeptical
That a society heretical
Can become acceptable,
Go beyond directionals
And be that someone epical.
So.
I'm the real Poet Christopher.
The real Poet Christopher.
All you other Poet Christophers 
Are just bad pretenders.
So, won't Poet Christopher
Please blow up.
Please blow up.
Please blow up.
Christopher Allen Breidinger ©2015

replies.message: By fart out train spotting drug mic#ran me outside
if can offer me something i will be glud...please..
